name: Adverse Resolve
desc: Greatly increases critical rate when being ambushed.

name: Mahamaon
desc: Medium chance of killing all enemies via Bless damage.

name: Mamudoon
desc: Medium chance of killing all enemies via Curse damage.

name: Mamudo
desc: Low chance of killing all enemies via Curse damage.

name: Mahama
desc: Low chance of killing all enemies via Bless damage.

name: Dia
desc: Slightly heals 1 ally.

name: Diarama
desc: Moderately heals 1 ally.

name: Diarahan
desc: Fully heals 1 ally.

name: Media
desc: Slightly heals all allies

name: Mediarama
desc: Moderately heals all allies.

name: Mediarahan
desc: Fully heals all allies.

name: Salvation
desc: Fully heals all allies and their ailments.

name: Snipe
desc: Strengthens Gun attacks by 1.25x

name: Cripple
desc: Strengthens Gun attacks by 1.5x

name: Fast Heal
desc: Doubles ailment heal rate.

name: Evil Touch
desc: High chance of inflicting Fear on 1 foe.

name: Evil Smile
desc: Medium chance of inflicting Fear on all foes.

name: Firm Stance
desc: Halves all incoming damage, but you can no longer evade attacks.

name: Counter
desc: Low chance to counter Physical/Gun attacks.

name: Counterstrike
desc: Medium chance to counter Physical/Gun attacks.

name: High Counter
desc: High chance to counter Physical/Gun attacks.

name: Apt Pupil
desc: Increases your Critical hit rate.

name: Taunt
desc: High chance of inflicting Rage on 1 foe.

name: Ghastly Wail
desc: Instantly kill all foes that are inflicted with Fear.

name: Pressing Stance
desc: Increases evasion by 1.33x when being ambushed.

name: Fortified Moxy
desc: Increases Critical hit rate when ambushing the enemy.

name: Abysmal Surge
desc: Medium chance of inflicting Despair on all foes.

name: Ominous Words
desc: High chance of inflicting Despair on 1 foe.

name: Sharp Student
desc: Lowers incoming critical rate chance.

name: Growth 1
desc: Boosts experience gain by 1.25x (unstackable).

name: Growth 2
desc: Boosts experience gain by 1.5x (unstackable).

name: Growth 3
desc: Boosts experience gain by 2x (unstackable).

name: Demonic Decree
desc: Halves HP of one foe by Curse damage.

name: Thermopylae
desc: Boosts Attack, Defense and Accuracy for 3 turns to all allies. Only usable when being ambushed.

name: Invigorate 1
desc: Regenerate 3 SP at the start of every turn.

name: Regenerate 1
desc: Recover 2% HP at the start of every turn.

name: Invigorate 2
desc: Regenerate 5 SP at the start of every turn.

name: Regenerate 2
desc: Recover 4% HP at the start of every turn.

name: Invigorate 3
desc: Regenerate 7 SP at the start of every turn.

name: Regenerate 3
desc: Recover 6% HP at the start of every turn.

name: Invigorate 4
desc: Regenerate 9 SP at the start of every turn.

name: Regenerate 4
desc: Recover 8% HP at the start of every turn.

name: Invigorate 5
desc: Regenerate 11 SP at the start of every turn.

name: Regenerate 5
desc: Recover 10% HP at the start of every turn.

name: Absorb Phys
desc: Absorbs Curse type attacks, healing for 0.5x damage dealt.

name: Rainy Play
desc: Greatly increases evasion during Rain.

name: Cadenza
desc: Moderately restore HP and buff all users with Sukukaja. Unique to Orpheus.

name: Oratorio
desc: Fully restore HP and clear all allies *nda effects. Unique to Messiah.

name: Foul Breath
desc: Increases 1 foes susceptibility to ailments.

name: Stagnant Air
desc: Increases everyones susceptibility to ailments.

name: Pulinpa
desc: High chance of inflicting Confuse on 1 foe.

name: Samsara
desc: High chance of killing all enemies via Bless damage.

name: Die For Me!
desc: High chance of killing all enemies via Curse damage.

name: Charge
desc: Will increase your next Physical/Gun attack power by 2.5x.

name: Concentrate
desc: Will increase your next Special attack power by 2.5x.

name: Amrita Shower
desc: Heals all ailments of your team.

name: Amrita Drop
desc: Heals all ailments of 1 ally.

name: Tetrakarn
desc: Creates a shield around 1 ally that reflects 1 Physical/Gun attack.

name: Makarakarn
desc: Creates a shield around 1 ally that reflects 1 Special attack.

name: Brain Jack
desc: Medium chance to inflict Brainwash on all foes.

name: Marin Karin
desc: High chance to inflict Brainwash on 1 foe.

name: Almighty Boost
desc: Boosts Almighty type skills' power by 1.25x.

name: Fortify Spirit
desc: Reduces ailment susceptibility.

name: Mudoon
desc: High chance of instantly killing 1 foe by Curse damage.

name: Hamaon
desc: High chance of instantly killing 1 foe by Bless damage.

name: Mudo
desc: Medium chance of instantly killing 1 foe by Curse damage.

name: Hama
desc: Medium chance of instantly killing 1 foe by Bless damage.

name: Heat Riser
desc: Increases Attack, Defense and Accuracy/Evasion of all allies.

name: Debilitate
desc: Decreases Attack, Defense and Accuracy/Evasion of all enemies.

name: Enduring Soul
desc: Survive 1 fatal attack with HP fully recovered.

name: Endure
desc: Survive 1 fatal attack with 1 HP remaining.

name: Angelic Grace
desc: Doubles evasion rate against non-Almighty magic skills.

name: Spell Master
desc: Halves the cost of all magic skills.

name: Arms Master
desc: Halves the cost of all physical skills.

name: Makajam
desc: High chance of inflicting Forget on 1 foe.

name: Makajamaon
desc: Medium chance of inflicting Forget on all foes.

name: Tentarafoo
desc: Medium chance of inflicting Confuse on all foes.

name: Wage War
desc: Medium chance of inflicting Rage on all foes.

name: Dazzler
desc: High chance of inflicting Dizzy on 1 foe.

name: Nocturnal Flash
desc: Medium chance of inflicting Dizzy on 1 foe.

name: Dormina
desc: High chance of inflicting Sleep on 1 foe.

name: Lullaby
desc: Medium chance of inflicting Sleep on 1 foe.

name: Ambient Aid
desc: Greatly increases accuracy of ailment skills during rainy days or special weather.

name: Life Aid
desc: Recover 8% HP and SP after a successful battle.

name: Life Drain
desc: Drain 10% HP from one enemy.

name: Spirit Drain
desc: Drain 30 SP from one enemy.

name: Recarm
desc: Revives 1 ally with 50% HP restored.

name: Samarecarm
desc: Revives 1 ally with full HP restored.

name: Ailment Boost
desc: Boosts accuracy of all ailment attacks.

name: Divine Grace
desc: Effects of healing magic are increased by 50%.

name: Rebellion
desc: Increases 1 ally's Critical hit rate.

name: Revolution
desc: Increases all foes and allies Critical hit rate.

name: Victory Cry
desc: Fully heals HP and SP after successful battle.

name: Mudo Boost
desc: Boosts accuracy of Dark skills by 20.

name: Hama Boost
desc: Boosts accuracy of Light skills by 20.

name: Insta-Heal
desc: Heals ailments in 1 turn.

name: Trigger Happy
desc: Increase critical rate of all Gun attacks.

name: Ali Dance
desc: Half accuracy of incoming attacks.

name: Heat Up
desc: Recover 5% HP and 10 SP at the start of every turn during a successful ambush.
